application.name: BIM - Batch Image Manager
application.description: A powerful desktop application for batch image conversion with FFmpeg integration. Convert multiple images to various formats and sizes with custom presets and flexible naming options.
application.updateMessage: Initial release with batch image conversion capabilities

items: Batch image conversion with FFmpeg integration
Multiple image format support (PNG, JPG, JPEG, WebP, BMP, TIFF)
Custom preset creator with flexible naming system
Three sizing modes: Square, Dimension, and Aspect Ratio
Multiple output formats per conversion
Configurable resolution position in filenames
Pre-built conversion presets (App Icons, Social Media, Web)
Movable sidebar with top/bottom/left/right positioning
Dark/Light theme support with system sync
Custom window controls (frameless design)
System information display with OS detection
Application update checker
Dependency version monitoring (FFmpeg)
Real-time conversion progress tracking
Custom output directory selection
Individual variant conversion control
platformChanges: Initial release with Windows, Linux, and macOS support

items: Fixed name parts input to preserve exact spacing
Resolved comma handling in custom preset creator
Fixed sidebar default position to left
Corrected application naming from heroui_tauriv2 to BIM
Updated package identifier to com.sutsoa.bim
Fixed window title display
Resolved framer-motion type errors in animations

dependencies.name: FFmpeg
dependencies.updateMessage: Required for image conversion. Please ensure FFmpeg is installed and available in your system PATH.
